import React,{useState,useEffect,useRef,useCallback} from "react"; import './AugmentedTeam.css'; import "@fontsource/red-hat-display"; import './../min.css'; import augmented_bg from './resources/augmented_bg.svg' import post_job from './resources/post-job.svg' import freelancer from './resources/freelancer.svg' import need_something from './resources/need-something.svg' function WhatIsGreat(){ const [slideIndex, setSlideIndex] = useState(0); const [slideCount,setSlideCount]=useState(0); const [prevScreen,setPrevScreen]=useState(2); const stateRef = useRef(); stateRef.current=slideIndex; const showDivs=(n)=>{ if (slideIndex+n >= slideCount) { setSlideIndex(0); } else if (slideIndex+n < 0) { setSlideIndex(slideCount-1); } else{ setSlideIndex(slideIndex+n); } } useEffect(()=>{ var i; var x = document.getElementsByClassName("great-slides"); for (i = 0; i < x.length; i++) { x[i].style.display = "none"; } x[slideIndex].className="great-slides fade-in"; x[slideIndex].style.display = "block"; setSlideCount(document.getElementsByClassName("great-slides").length); },[slideIndex]); return(
